org.apache.flex.compiler.fxg.flex

Class FXGSymbolClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.fxg.flex.FXGSymbolClass

  • public class FXGSymbolClass
extends Object
    Used to map a SWF symbol generated for a particular FXG node to an ActionScript class. This association links a tag primitive to more complex assets, such as the ActionScript implementation of a TextGraphic node (which does not have a tag primitive equivalent).
